interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Unaone 3 Pieces Hairpin Headbands for women, Fashion Double Layer Twist Plait Hair Bands with Clips, Elegant Hair Accessories Pearl Headband for Girls (Black)
Review Date: 2022/09/18
Store: Unaone
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthday', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Fabric Type': 'resin', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Package Dimensions': '6.85 x 6.22 x 2.13 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:e563c8a3475169771977f3622d735298]] These headbands are nice. All plastic with some bend to them. I work these and twisted little pieces of hair and clipped the hair in. It does stay in place and gives some life to your hair. Over time though ( talking full day wear at least 8 hours) it can become bothersome. I found it easier to have wet hair and twist your hair into the clips. Value is fair.
Review Title: works well
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Rated Green - Hibiscus Moisturizing Scalp Pack - Tube - 6.76 fl. oz. Cold Brewed Organic Hibiscus with Natural Honey - Softening Hair Mask for Women & Men
RATED GREEN
{'Brand': 'RATED GREEN', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Product Dimensions': '19.69 x 19.69 x 11.02 inches; 7.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'RGNOP2'}
Used my regular shampoo, then followed up with this hair mask. Left it on for 5 mins and brushed it through my hair with a comb in the shower. The smell is amazing( if you like bananas, which I do ) After washing I let my hair air dry and my hair is so smooth and soft. I also have a nice shine to my hair. I notice with this product a little goes a long way so one bottle can last a while. Never used a hair mask before and I really like the life it gave my hair back.  I will continue to use this 1-2 times a week.
Amazing soft smooth hair after use
Utrue 2PCS Rhinestone Headbands（random color）
Utrue
{'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Fabric Type': 'plastic', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Brand': 'Utrue', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 0.5 inches; 8.36 Ounces', 'UPC': '787365720155'}
I have to say these are really nice headbands and very well made. The stones sparkle. Now this could just be preference, I don't like how bulky they are and how much they pop up on my head. Thats why I gave them 4 stars. They are comfortable and you can wear all day without getting a headache!
Really well made.. buttt
Rated Green - Hibiscus Moisturizing Scalp Pack - Tube - 6.76 fl. oz. Cold Brewed Organic Hibiscus with Natural Honey - Softening Hair Mask for Women & Men
RATED GREEN
{'Brand': 'RATED GREEN', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Product Dimensions': '19.69 x 19.69 x 11.02 inches; 7.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'RGNOP2'}
Used this for a few treatments, what I notice, my scalp is softer and  my hair has some more moisture and a little more volume and looks healthier, Didn't notice a difference with flakes or dandruff( but I really only have issues with this in the colder months) .  I like that its all natural, less chemicals the better for my hair.
does moisturize
Beautiful Girl You Can Do Amazing Things, Inspirational Gifts for Women, Christmas Gifts, Amazing Gifts for Teen Girls, Beautiful Gift Makeup Bag, Inspirational Jewelry Dish, Amazing Mirror
VeryMerryMakering
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 5.31 x 2.52 inches; 11.68 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8R-EFX1-UF4C', 'Department': 'girls', 'UPC': '733420649831', 'Manufacturer': 'VeryMerryMakering'}
This is a really cute idea. The bag is very sturdy and canvas material. The mirror is nice and compact and beautifully etched. The tray is heavy duty ceramic with a nice print. Very nice and worth the price.
Nice quality
YiJiaBa Temporary Tattoos 430 PCS, Forest Animals, Insects, Sea Animals, for little Boys and Girls Non-Toxic Food Grade Ingredients Safe Removable
YiJiaBa
{'Brand': 'YiJiaBa', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Water Resistant', 'Pattern': 'Tribal', 'Number of Pieces': '430', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Kid', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.91 x 0.35 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '766559403739'}
These are great! Very detailed, nice color and a huge variety. Very easy to apply on and they do last a while. If you are submerging them in water they will fade and peel more quickly. Great as rewards and great value for the quantity you get.
Great detail and long lasting
buyifan 430pcs Kids Temporary Tattoo for Forest Animals, Insects, Sea Animals,Circus theme Tattoos Sticker,for little Boys and Girls Waterproof Long Lasting and Non-toxic
BUYIFAN
{'Color': 'Multicolor', 'Brand': 'BUYIFAN', 'Style': 'Tattoos Sticker', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Pattern': 'Tribal', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.83 x 0.47 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '768494201005'}
Purchased these for my treasure box at work. There is something for everyone in this package of tattoos. I tired them on myself and they lasted 3 days with showering and scrubbing daily.  My students get a kick out of these and often show up to school wearing them. I have seen them last 3-5 days on my students. Cute images, bright colors and worth the price.
works great
FROG SAC Interchangeable Charm Headbands for Girls, Rainbow Star Heart Headband for Kids, Preppy Chenille Patch Little Girl Hair Bands, Thin Toddler Hairband, Hair Clip Accessories for Children
FROG SAC
{'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'FROG SAC', 'Size': 'Adjustable', 'Item Form': 'Ribbon', 'Package Dimensions': '10.94 x 8.78 x 0.55 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Department': 'girls', 'UPC': '607476125116', 'Manufacturer': 'Natalia Marketing Corp.'}
[[VIDEOID:4ac654fc7fdebfbf632adf413f0bd7a1]] Exactly as pictured.  Bright colors and comfortable head band. The charms have clasps that clip on to the head band. It is comfortable but after long wear it can get annoying. I will say they do stay on the headband without falling off.  Cute for children that love to change their headbands frequently and cost effective.
nice
